pullrequest.title: Fix drc practice launch files, and models and world for task 6

content.raw:
I just refactored the drc_practice launch files so that the repeated configuration is in drc_practice.launch, and each task will mainly just specify the initial robot position.

I also moved the initial position of atlas forward in task 1, because there's some trimesh collision problems if atlas falls backwards.

I also fixed the vrc_task launch files so atlas starts in bdi_stand mode.
content.html:
I just refactored the drc_practice launch files so that the repeated configuration is in drc_practice.launch, and each task will mainly just specify the initial robot position.

I also moved the initial position of atlas forward in task 1, because there's some trimesh collision problems if atlas falls backwards.

I also fixed the vrc_task launch files so atlas starts in bdi_stand mode.
